Class ClientConfigurationProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.api.core.config.AbstractConfigurationProperties<ClientConfigurationPropertyConstant>

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class ClientConfigurationProperties
extends AbstractConfigurationProperties<ClientConfigurationPropertyConstant>
implements Serializable
    Object holding client specific configuration properties.

    • Method Detail

      • getClientTimeZoneId

        public String getClientTimeZoneId()
        Returns the time zone id of this client or null.
        Returns:
        the time zone id or null

      • getConfluenceConfiguration

        public ConfluenceConfiguration getConfluenceConfiguration()
        Returns the confluence authentication configuration. The configuration is returned as a copy to avoid direct manipulation. To modify the configuration use ConfigurationManagement.
        Returns:
        the confluence authentication configuration

      • getDefaultBlogId

        public Long getDefaultBlogId()
        Returns:
        The ID of the default blog or null if there is no default blog

      • getDefaultLanguage

        public Locale getDefaultLanguage()
        Get default locale if default language is null or not a valid language code return english
        Returns:
        Locale

      • getExternalSystemConfigurations

        public Collection<ExternalSystemConfiguration> getExternalSystemConfigurations()
        Returns:
        all available external system configurations

      • getLdapConfiguration

        @Deprecated
public LdapConfiguration getLdapConfiguration()
        Deprecated. use UserService.getExternalSystemConfiguration(String)
        Returns the LDAP configuration. The configuration is returned as a copy to avoid direct manipulation. To modify the configuration use ConfigurationManagement.updateLdapConfiguration(LdapConfiguration)
        Returns:
        the LDAP configuration

      • getPrimaryExternalAuthentication

        public String getPrimaryExternalAuthentication()

      • getProperty

        public String getProperty(ClientConfigurationPropertyConstant key)
        Returns the property value for the key as String.
        Specified by:
        getProperty in class AbstractConfigurationProperties<ClientConfigurationPropertyConstant>
        Parameters:
        key - the key
        Returns:
        the property value or null if there is no property for the key

      • getPropertyLastModification

        public Date getPropertyLastModification(ClientConfigurationPropertyConstant key)
        Return the time of the last modification of the property.

        Note: for properties which were added before the modification time was stored this will return the date of epoch

        Parameters:
        key - the key of the property to retrieve
        Returns:
        the date of the last modification or null if there is no property for the given key

      • getRepositoryMode

        public ClientProperty.REPOSITORY_MODE getRepositoryMode()
        Returns:
        The configured Repository mode or the default if not set. Never returns null.

      • isConfluenceAuthenticationActivated

        @Deprecated
public boolean isConfluenceAuthenticationActivated()
        Deprecated. use UserService.getExternalSystemConfiguration(String)
        Checks if a Confluence authentication is configured and activated.
        Returns:
        true, if Confluence authentication is configured and activated

      • isDBAuthenticationAllowed

        public boolean isDBAuthenticationAllowed()
        Returns:
        True, when it is allowed to register users via the internal database.

      • isDefaultBlogEnabled

        public boolean isDefaultBlogEnabled()
        Checks if the default blog is configured.
        Returns:
        true, if there is a configured default blog

      • isExternalAuthenticationActivated

        public boolean isExternalAuthenticationActivated()
        Checks if an external authentication e.g. via LDAP is activated.
        Returns:
        true, if there is a configured and activated external authentication

      • isLdapAuthenticationActivated

        @Deprecated
public boolean isLdapAuthenticationActivated()
        Deprecated. use getExternalSystemConfigurations()
        Checks if an LDAP authentication is configured and activated.
        Returns:
        true, if LDAP authentication is configured and activated

      • isRegistrationAllowed

        public boolean isRegistrationAllowed()
        Returns:
        True, if is allowed for users to register themselves.
